Job Title: Director, Finance Brand Management

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Newell Brands is a leading $8.5B consumer products company with a portfolio of iconic brands such as Graco®, Coleman®, Oster®, Rubbermaid® and Sharpie®, and 28,000 talented employees around the world. Our high-performance culture, unparalleled curiosity about the world around us, and talented people fuel our success. Our culture is enabled through our core values which guide all we do and how we win as One Newell. They are Integrity, Teamwork, Passion for Winning, Ownership & Leadership.

Job Overview

This finance leader will serve as a key business partner to the Brand Management function as we continue to advance the operating model and transform our front-end capabilities. This role will be responsible for leading and driving the implementation of the financial tools consistent with Commercial Agenda. The successful individual will leverage strong working knowledge and project management skills to accelerate progress in key capabilities areas including innovation, brand building, long term planning and go-to-market excellence.

Responsibilities

Provide financial partnership to Executives within the Marketing function across all of Newell.Lead development, implementation and support of financial tools and frameworks to support long-range business and financial planning including maintaining Global A&P and Innovation trackers.Drive consistency and rigor across the economic aspects of the new product development process including standard analysis of all Tier 1 and Tier 2 initiatives.Partner across various functions including Finance, Marketing, IT and Sales to deliver Commercial capability agenda.Direct and/or provide financial reporting across Global Innovation, Marketing Spend/ROI and Marketing Overhead.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or related discipline.10-15 years relevant experience in a CPG Finance.Ability to work independently and proven success in a fast paced, matrixed organization.Self-starter with proven track record of working thru ambiguity, building relationships and consensus amongst diverse teams.Experience setting up new processes and demonstrated strong analytic capability.Excellent communication and executive presentation skills

Preferred Qualifications

MBA or CPAFinancial systems experienceManagement of large, enterprise projects

_Newell Brands (NASDAQ: NWL) is a leading global consumer goods company with a strong portfolio of well-known brands, including Rubbermaid, Sharpie, Graco, Coleman, Rubbermaid Commercial Products, Yankee Candle, Paper Mate, FoodSaver, Dymo, EXPO, Elmer’s, Oster, NUK, Spontex and Campingaz. We are focused on delighting consumers by lighting up everyday moments. Newell Brands and its subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity Employers and comply with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Director
